page.title: 15HORBURY LEISURE
page.content: People in Horbury take part in many sports.My favourite one is football.I play at school and also for the under-13 team in the village of Netherton,south of Horbury.There are lots of pub teams and leagues in Horbury for football,cricket,darts and dominoes. BROWNIES:I attend meetings of the Brownies group at Northfield Lane School from 6.15 to 7.30pm on Mondays.Brownies are all girls and we wear a brown uniform with a yellow necktie.Each person has a badge to show which one of the six patrols they belong to.We pay 20p a week subscription. CHURCH: I go to Sunday School at St. Mary's church.We sing songs and say prayers before we go to our classes.Our school lollipop lady Mrs Davies,is one of our teachers.
